author: Luke Lee
description: All-in-One Presence Detection System - combines WiFi MQTT detection, GPS geofencing, Anyone logic, manual override, and delayed away. Includes individual presence drivers and composite aggregation driver for 'anyone home' functionality
releaseNotes: Version 0.3.1 - Fixed Present Count timing issue: resolved WiFi connection not updating Present Count by implementing delayed statistics update in componentPresenceHandler. Enhanced debugging with detailed child device status logging. Improved componentRefresh to update statistics after refresh operations.
